column2: Left click for primary fire. Right click for alt fire. Kick to cycle soul group used.
Your spells become stronger the deeper you are.
Marks enemies to drop a Lesser Soul on death.
Your spells become stronger the higher you are.
Right click to teleport to the fast travel room.
Cast to charm nearby reap-marked creatures.
Summons 2 projectile-eating orbs to protect you.
Imbues the spell with materialistic values.
Improves the radar of the tome.
Converts nearby corpses into a healing liquid.
